post.body: nah i hate that shit. My mom and my dad ask questions during movies. It's like, i havent seen this shit either, stop asking me!!!
@hurryupnbuy you bastards would get Vick and ruin my football for the next 10 years wouldnt u
@hurryUPnBUY did you see him get laid out on that forward pass???
yea cowboys fans are on snack duty to make room. the floor is open if they want to sit
what is mafia?
since the money is probably dirtier than their hands...yes. http://tinyurl.com/6wjloq
PCASSO putting out a live mixtape of band in jan. got a theme for the nxt project but i need some pcasso beats!!! I'll b down nxt wknd
PCASSO Right, yea i never had that candy b4...or weed for that matter. So how r those beats?
PCASSO I never tried the wine and weed thing, i feel like i would just pass out.
Jayelectronica definitely pause worthy
Aeongrey lol what?
NolaDarling thanx for the correction cuz it was a 'wtf' statement @ first
I have room on the couch for Jets and Pats fans next weekend. Misery loves company.
Jack and cokes, steak hoagies and stumbling drunks. my last wknd in Bflo
Thrift store shopping with Mitch and Ju 'Writin in my head to a Madlib breakbeat nucka...' - Von Pea
I could watch A Christmas Story all day. Happy Holidays
If anybody's still up, DC or ATL? Just lft the rock band party to a hbcu debate on where to raise a fam
Middle aged jewish and christians grinding to No Doubts 'Underneath it All'. Its what the holidays are all about
No Doubt starting the nite off right with the 'Don't Speak' sing along on Rock Band. Thank god for the lyrics scrolling on the screen
oh and reading http://tinyurl.com/2fe27 very interesting for all you sci fi/futurist heads
